about.title: About WAKA
about.subtitle: Overview
about.description:
WAKA Global Art & Music Nexus is an international cultural platform initiated from the United Arab Emirates. It is structured to provide curated exhibition opportunities and professionally governed art competitions across multiple global cities.

The initiative is designed to operate within the legal frameworks of host countries while maintaining transparency, ethical standards, and professional integrity.

WAKA seeks to strengthen connections between the Middle East, Africa, Europe, and North America through artistic mobility and cultural collaboration.
about.vision: To establish a globally respected cultural institution that connects artists, cities, and creative economies through sustainable and professionally governed platforms.
